Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan and Sri Lanka will square off in what is anticipated to be an exciting T20 Asia Cup 2022 final clash at the Dubai International Stadium tonight.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan played four finals previously and has won two titles.
If they win, it will be their sixth title.
Men in Green won only once and lost thrice.
The high-octane clash will kick off at 7pm.
Others: Sri Lanka played 11 out of 14 Asia Cup finals previously.
Today will be their 12th out of 15th.
